errorHttpResponseCode.description: http response code for error code

additionalErrorMessage.description: Message which is added to the error response to help user resolve problem

caseSensitive.description: Whether the paths should be considered in case-sensitive manner

expandVirtualReposToLocal.description: Paths with prefixed with virtual repos are expanded into local repos - eg. maven-local-virtual/.... is expanded to maven-local-x1/,maven-local-x2/,..

enabledPath.description: enable verification only for these Ant paths only, apply for all if empty/not defined. Verification is applied only for both enabled & not ignored paths. Ant path matching, see https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/current/javadoc-api/org/springframework/util/AntPathMatcher.html

ignorePath.description: These paths are being ignored from verification. Ant path matching, see https://docs.spring.io/spring-framework/docs/current/javadoc-api/org/springframework/util/AntPathMatcher.html

enabled.description: True if plugin feature should be enabled

extensions.description: for which extensions should be used JAR verification

password.description: Path to keystore password. It cannot be null

alias.description: Key alias(friendly name) in the keystore file

enabled.description: True if plugin feature should be enabled

pgpKeyIds.description: list of PGP key ids for which should be given rpm file valid
